caption: A child's hand placing a broken toy into a father's weathered hands, bathed in warm light.
image_prompt: A close-up of a child's small hands gently placing a cracked wooden toy into the strong, weathered hands of an unseen father figure. Warm golden light spills over the scene, casting soft shadows and highlighting the texture of the toy's fractures. The background is softly blurred, suggesting a quiet, intimate space. The focus is on the trust and tenderness of the gesture, evoking themes of repair and care.
